data.eml:eml: A taxonomic study of Muscidifurax Girault & Sanders from China (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Pteromalidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xiao, Hui, Zhou, Shi-yu, Tong, Yan-feng (2018): A taxonomic study of Muscidifurax Girault & Sanders from China (Hymenoptera, Chalcidoidea, Pteromalidae). ZooKeys 776: 91-103, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.776.25030, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.776.25030
